Text:
10k download speed. I'll look forward to watching this some time in mid April. Thanks to the uploader nonetheless.

The Vampire Diaries has over 24k seeders. This post has 5. What a fucked up world.

It seems I'm the only remaining seeder left in there. Please excuse my bandwidth which is very limited. I tuned it in order to prioritize the Tireno Adriatico (75~80 kb/s max). This race is by far the most amazing race that happend this year (along with the Paris-Roubaix). You may watch Sagan slaloming within a 20% up wall just before the finish (after climbing a 1km - 30% up wall...). This Guy is amazing.
Someone got the idea where to find the "tour du pays basque" or "tour of the basque country"?
